pages.text:
Title: Rethinking Value in the Knowledge Economy

Abstract: The emerging business model of value creation includes both social and environmental capital as well as human, structural, and customer capital.

Keywords: Statistics, Business, Economics, Value (mathematics), Mathematics, Market economy
